entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
